name: THE BLUE BLAST
description:
THE BLUE BLAST

feemsoft

Default controls:

Move with the arrowkeys

Shoot: A

Slow motion: S

Pause: Space

Toggle fullscreen: F4

For more information take a look at the "How to play" section in the main menu.

Music by PHILLIP CHANCE

*Press escape to close*

STORY

earth is in trouble its up to you

"BLUE BLAST"to save the world from the alien colony by challenging their best pilots

to and all out to the death battle!!!!
